creator: brobertson@mta.ca
text:
The SVGGraphics2D generator will often, but not always, add 'font-size'
attributes to 'line' and 'circle' elements. These are not allowed by the
svg10.dtd. Tested with 1.5b2 and 1.5b4, built from CVS around 2003-03-01. 

SVG generated with this class' drawPart method:
http://heml.mta.ca/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi/heml_cvs/src/org/heml/image/timeline/TimelineLineStyle.java

will usually exhibit this. g2.setFont(null) seems to help sometimes.

The erroneous output can be found in timelines generated at http://heml.mta.ca,
for instance the  one referred to in the html at:
http://heml.mta.ca/heml-cocoon/sample-timeline

I know of no SVG viewer that complains about this.
Fixed. Regression test included in regard with id "Bug17965"
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
